title: Outrageous Women of Ancient Times
description: The author of "Uppity Women of Ancient Times" returns triumphant, this time to entertain and inspire young readers. From the first female pharaoh of Egypt, to the first woman artist to have her name known throughout ancient Rome, here are 21 thrilling "herstories" of outspoken women who displayed courage "and" attitude in ancient civilizations throughout the world. A compelling celebration of female guts, smarts and originality.
